name: Cube Game (hashbeep)
description:
What does this app do?

You can watch the Cube spin! Who wouldn't love to watch the Cube spin?

How do I interact with this app?

You can make the Cube spin faster by left clicking, or slow it down by right clicking! But if you right click enough, you'll make the Cube spin faster than before! Middle clicking resets the Cube's spin, and pressing Q creates special Cubes that don't like being touched! Pressing spacebar hides the control text!

What can I expect from this app?

The glory and simplicity of watching the Cube spin.

Nowadays, apps are too complicated. Returning to simpler times like this is what we need.

- Features -

Feature 1: Cube Spin

The Cube can spin faster, slower, and be reset by user interaction (left, right, and middle click, respectively).

Feature 2: Cube Spawn
You can spawn other cubes by pressing Q.

Feature 3: Cube Color Change
Spawned cubes change color upon being hovered over.

Feature 4: Mouse Tracking
The cursor's current positioning is displayed in the lower-left hand corner of the camera.
